html:
PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2024-07102024-06-17AAFC, CFIA
ActFeeds Act
Health of Animals Act
Food and Drugs Act
SubjectFeeds Regulations, 2024
PrecisFEEDS REGULATIONS, 2024 in order to (1) repeal and replace the Canadian Food Inspection Agency's Feeds Regulations, 1983; and add a new requirements for hazard analysis and preventive controls; traceability requirements; safety standards for feeds; licensing requirements;updated, clearer, and broader approach for approval or registration of feeds; labelling requirements; expand the scope of species applicable under the Feeds Act; update and clarify general and specific exemptions; incorporate by reference various technical documents; and (2) minimize the health risks for livestock and Canadians associated with livestock feeds manufactured in or imported into Canada.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2024-0132 Publication Date: 2024-07-03
AttachmentsAttachment
